03:00 PM

Landmarks Commission Meeting
Tuesday February 03 - 03:00 PM to 03:00 PM

Sonoma County, CA

The Landmarks Commission designates historic landmarks, reviews development proposals involving historic properties, and administers an historic resources preservation program. The Landmarks Commission meets the 1st Tuesday of each month (and as needed). Source: Sonoma County Government

Design Review Committee Meeting
Wednesday February 04 - 01:30 PM to 01:30 PM

Sonoma County, CA

The Design Review Committee (DRC) reviews and approves the design of significant new development projects, such as new commercial development. The Committee considers building and site design, architecture, colors, lighting, signs, landscaping and other design-related issues. Source: Sonoma County ...

The Unknown Wayne Thiebaud: Passionate Printmaker
Sunday February 08 - 10:00 AM to 04:00 PM
